sentences.sentence: The Sifter salutes you and your craft!
sentences.translation: 该筛赞扬你和你的手艺！

sentences.sentence: The robot sifter has been put into use.
sentences.translation: 自动筛选机已投入使用。

sentences.sentence: Main Products: crusher, mixer, sifter, tablet machine.
sentences.translation: 主要产品：粉碎机、混合机、筛粉机、压片机等。
